resources.string: Your beacon has not been detected
MAC address of the Bluetooth device
The changes have been successfully applied.
The beacon %s has been linked with this vehicle. The application will automatically record your trip when the beacon is close to your smartphone.
You must associate a beacon for this vehicle
The Bluetooth %s device has been linked to this vehicle. The application automatically records your trip when your phone is connected to this device.
Select a Bluetooth system for this vehicle
With this setting, automatic start is disabled for this vehicle.
The application uses the phone\'s sensors to automatically detect your trips. This mode has been optimized to limit battery consumption.
Please check the data you entered
You parked your vehicle on %1$s at %2$s.
To see your vehicle\'s position, you must first record a trip.
Your vehicle is located about %s kilometers from your current position.
Your vehicle is located about %s miles from your current position.
Your vehicle is located about %s meters from your current position.
Your vehicle is located about %s yards from your current position.
Your vehicle is located less than 100 meters from your current position.
Your vehicle is located less than 100 yards from your position.
The beacon is not available. It\'s already paired to another vehicle.
This beacon is already paired to this vehicle.
The %1$s beacon will be dissociated from the %2$s vehicle.\nWould you like to continue?
You haven\'t configured a beacon yet.
You have to enable the phone\'s Bluetooth sensor to check the beacon.
Tap on the screen to try again
The identifier %s is valid but the corresponding beacon has not been detected.\n\nMake sure that this beacon is turned on and located next to the phone
The beacon has been checked and is working correctly
Do you confirm the pairing of beacon %1$s with vehicle %2$s ?
Please enter the ID displayed on the beacon
Make sure that the identification number of the beacon is readable
Remove the tab that protects the beacon\'s battery
If you confirm your choice, the %1$s beacon will be associated with the %2$s vehicle.\n\nThe %3$s vehicle will no longer be associated with this beacon.
The application retrieves the information from the beacon and checks that it is running properly
We invite you to put the beacon in the glove box of your vehicle
Congratulations!\n\nThe beacon %1$s is now associated with the vehicle %2$s
Place your beacon near your phone and tap on the screen
The detected beacon is not associated with this vehicle.
The Bluetooth %1$s device is already connected to another vehicle. You must first detach the device before pairing it with %2$s.
The Bluetooth device %1$s is now linked to the vehicle %2$s
From now on, recording your trips will start automatically as soon as your phone connects to the Bluetooth device %s
The %1$s device will be disassociated from the %2$s vehicle.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
Make sure that your vehicle\'s Bluetooth system is already paired with your phone before you start.
Check that the Bluetooth device has already been paired with your iPhone. This information is available in the Bluetooth menu of the phone\'s settings.
The application will search for all devices that have already been connected to your phone.
Take a seat in your vehicle.
You will need to select the one that matches your vehicle\'s Bluetooth system.
Switch on the ignition. The phone must be connected to the vehicle to make the association.

No Bluetooth devices were detected.

To enable auto start, make sure your phone is connected to the Bluetooth system.

Can you verify in the phone settings that the Bluetooth system is connected to your phone?

This category corresponds to vehicles for professional use generally intended for the transport of goods. These vehicles have a large storage capacity and the total permissible laden weight is between 1.5 tonnes and 3.5 tonnes.
This category corresponds to vehicles belonging to segment B2. These are compact vehicles that are suitable for both urban and road use and are between 3.70 and 4.10 m long.
This category corresponds to sedans with luxurious styling and powerful engines.
This category corresponds to vehicles belonging to segments B0 and B1. These are very compact vehicles for urban use with a length of less than 3.70 m.

This category corresponds to vehicles whose interior volume is optimized for families with several children. They generally offer five to seven places. Their size varies on average from 4.80 to 5.00 m.
This category corresponds to vehicles belonging to segment D. They are larger than compact vehicles, equipped with powerful engines and whose length varies between 4.50 and 4.90 m.
This category includes vehicles with performance-oriented engines, chassis and braking systems.
This category corresponds to crossover vehicles or off-road vehicles with all-wheel drive (4x4) and whose length varies on average from 4.10 to 5.20 m.
What kind of truck do you drive?
A beacon is already associated with the vehicle %s
The Bluetooth device is already paired to the vehicle.
Do you confirm the suppression of the vehicle %s? Mileage monitoring and maintenance data will be definitively deleted.
The vehicle data has been modified. Would you like to save them?
You know the brand, model and characteristics of your vehicle
An error occurred during the request, please retry later
The beacon could not be associated with the vehicle, please try again later.
The Bluetooth connection to the vehicle failed, please try again later.
Vehicle characteristics could not be recovered.
Failed to retrieve vehicle data, please retry later
The name of your vehicle must not exceed 50 characters.
Do you want to set the detection mode %1$s for the vehicle %2$s?\n\nThe vehicle detection mode %3$s will be switched to %4$s.
Please add at least one vehicle
You can customize the name of your vehicle. If you do not choose a name, the application will assign a default name.
No model found for this type of engine
The value entered is not plausible.
To benefit from all services, please enter the value read on your vehicle\'s odometer
Failed to synchronize vehicle odometer, please retry later.
The mileage record has been added
The mileage record has been deleted
The value must be in the range of 0 to 1,000,000 km
The value entered cannot be lower than those previously entered.
No mileage record matches the identifier provided.
The mileage record has been updated

The analyzed distance, displayed in bold, is the sum of the distances of all the trips recorded since you have been using the application.\nThe value at the bottom of this card corresponds to the analyzed distance for the current year.

By analyzing your vehicle usage, the application estimates the distance you are likely to travel between January 1 and December 31 of the current year. The first estimate will be displayed after 3 weeks of use of the application.

The vehicle mileage takes into account the references you have entered and the distance analyzed by the application. We recommend that you make regular updates. If you forget, the application will send you a reminder.
The last odometer reading cannot be deleted.
Gross weight rating for the truck and trailer combination
This value may not exceed 44 tonnes
This value must be greater than the curb weight
Depending on the type of trailer or the configuration of your vehicle, you can adjust the gross vehicle weight rating of the truck and trailer combination.
If you don\'t know the characteristics of your vehicle, it will be setup automatically.
Choose a name to identify your vehicle

Select a Bluetooth device to start the trip recording.

As soon as the phone connects to this device, the application starts analyzing your trip.

You can only select one device for this vehicle.
Light and commercial vehicles of less than 3.5 t
Choose the category of your vehicle
The vehicle is unknown, please select another vehicle.
